Wordnik Data SDK

Introduction

The Wordnik Objective C Data and WordKit SDKs provide common APIs for accessing Wordnik's data from iOS and Mac OS X applications.

You'll need a valid Wordnik API Key to use these libraries. Please visit http://developer.wordnik.com to sign up for an API Key. You should also visit our documentation at http://developer.wordnik.com/docs to see the details of how the APIs work. While in most cases, the iOS SDKs will abstract the underlying Wordnik API from you, it's important to understand what is happening across the API.

Our most up-to-date documentation can be found at http://developer.wordnik.com/libraries/objective-c-sdk which provides code samples and recipes for using the SDK.
